short_desc: Silva Pediatric Medical Clinic is a primary care community clinic for children in Hayward and surrounding communities. Located at the Eden Youth Center, the Silva Clinic is dedicated to bilingual infant and pediatric care for birth to age 20
description: Silva Pediatric Medical Clinic is a primary care community clinic for children in Hayward and surrounding communities. Located at the Eden Youth Center, the Silva Clinic is dedicated to bilingual infant and pediatric care for birth to age 20. The clinic treats sick children; provides primary care, immunizations, counseling, and social services; and makes referrals to specialists and county services. Children who do not have health insurance or Medi-Cal may qualify to receive CHDP (Child Health and Disability Prevention) exams.
